descriptionHtml:
Adds glowing fins to the Dragonbone Arrows from Dawnguard.  

The fins (fletchings) glow a pale yellow, making them a LOT easier to find in the dark. The stats of the arrows are not effected in any way. The arrows in the quiver glow as well, but don\'t worry - enemies can\'t see them!

There are two versions, one with the glowing fins, and another with a small aura surrounding the fins as well. 

INSTALLATION

Use NMM, it\'s so easy. If you\'re stubborn, just extract the zip, and drop the data folder into your skyrim directory (or the meshes and textures folders into your data directory).

REMOVAL

Use NMM, it\'s so easy! If you didn\'t learn your lesson while installing, just delete the meshes.

SIMILAR

I\'ve done several similar mods:
Daedric Arrows: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42792/?
Nordic Arrows from Dragonborn: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43433/?
Dragonbone Arrows from Dawnguard: (this mod)
Nordic Dragonbone Arrows from AeonVita\'s Dragonbone Weapons mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43087/?
author: gizmologist

files.name: Glowing Fins for Dragonbone Arrows with Aura
files.fileName: Glowing Fins for Dragonbone Arrows with Aura-43497-1-0.zip
